name: Aroma de Nicaragua - Rubrum Ecuador - Robusto
additionalNotes: Aroma de Nicaragua is a High Quality Cigar coming from Nicaragua where all the winner brands are born, over 25 years of experience come together harvesting and selecting the finest leaves of Tobacco. According to the company, the Nicaraguan tobacco used in its blends is grown all four of the growing regions of the country: Condega, Estelí, Jalapa and Ometepe. The Rubrum line is made up of a stronger blend than the Original Blends, but each of the three wrappers is currently only available in one vitola that is exclusive to that line. Comes in Ecuador (Habano) wrapper, Nicaraguan filler and binder.
